soc.message
Class DevCard

java.lang.Object
  soc.message.Message
      soc.message.DevCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class DevCard
extends Message

This message means that a player is drawing or playing a development card

Author:
Robert S Thomas
See Also:
Serialized Form

DevCard

public DevCard(java.lang.String ga,
               int pn,
               int ac,
               int ct)
Create a DevCard message.

Parameters:
ga - name of the game
pn - the player number
ac - the type of action
ct - the type of card, like DevCardConstants.ROADS
